name: Charleston Light Dragoon's Punch
description: This antique punch is one of the most consistently popular drinks at Husk.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups fresh lemon juice from about 24 lemons
1 quart Bermuda or Barbados rum (Weaver uses Cockspur)
1/2 pint peach brandy (Weaver uses Hiram Walker)
Peels of 6 lemons, cut into slivers

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar, lemon juice, tea, brandy, rum, peach brandy, and lemon peels in a large bowl. Stir until sugar is dissolved and chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
Add ice (preferably in one large block) and top with soda water before serving. Alternatively, top each glass with 1 ounce of soda water before serving.
